docs.title: Abstract
docs.text: A style guide should help us to develop better readable ansible content.

docs.title: Motivation
docs.text: Ansible as a configuration management tool and generic automation framework has a lot of ways how to interact with it. We want to find a standarized approach how to work collaborative with ansible.
